name: SEGA Genesis - Console Tetris [by sangerge]
description:
2020年，我开发了两款世嘉MD自制游戏，一个是大家看到的这款《Console Tetris》，另一款是难度非常变态的《像素鸟》，由于难度太大，我不打算发布它，只发布这款《Console Tetris》。

开发世嘉MD游戏是非常有意思的事，我相信我还有机会开发更多的世嘉MD游戏。

In 2020, I developed two Sega MD self-made games, one is the "Console Tetris" that everyone has seen, and the other is "Pixel Bird" which is very difficult, because it is too difficult, I do not plan to release it. Only release this "Console Tetris".

It is very interesting to develop Sega MD games. I believe I still have the opportunity to develop more Sega MD games.
